notification.title: The title of your message displayed on screen (50 Chars)
notification.body: The intended message displayed on screen (180 Chars)

data.type: 1 or 2 or any other message type later invented... 1 is group message and 2 is secret message (1 or 2)
data.secret: [Empty unless type is 2] The encrypted secret (No more than 15 Chars)
data.asub: [Empty for Optional] The subject of the message displayed inside app (80 Chars)
data.amsg: The intended message displayed inside app (500 Chars)
data.acta: [Empty for Optional] The cta link parsed inside the app
data.aimg: [Empty for Optional] The image url which is shown inside the app
